text: @AshleyRParker Stop it! You should be ashamed of yourself! My brother in law died from COVID19 and my sister is still in the hospital recovering from it since 3/22. Who gives a damn about a grown ass man being begged to wear a mask! Presidential my ass!

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
